text: Anthony Afolabi Adegbola was a Nigerian Professor of Animal science and former President of the Nigerian Academy of Science. In 1993, he was elected President of the Nigerian Academy of Science to succeeded Professor Akpanoluo Ikpong Ikpong Ette. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:Nigerian academics Category:Nigerian zoologists Category:Nigerian biologists Category:Fellows of the Nigerian Academy of Science Category:Nigerian Academy of Science Category:Year of death missing
title: Anthony Afolabi Adegbola
